text: Robert Louis "Bob" Burns Jr. (November 24, 1950 â€“ April 3, 2015) was an American drummer. He was in the original line-up of the Southern rock band Lynyrd Skynyrd. Burns was born in Jacksonville, Florida. Burns died in a single car crash after hitting a mailbox and tree on a sharp curve in Bartow County, Georgia, late at night after a performance on April 3, 2015. He was 64 years old. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American rock drummers Category:Musicians from Jacksonville, Florida Category:Road accident deaths in the United States
title: Bob Burns (drummer)
